EmailTemplate.name: Account Mgr Introduction
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot Inside Account Mgr Introduction
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello, I wanted to introduce myself. My name is Scott Pearson and I am your Inside Account Manager. I work in partnership with your Inside Sales Representative. Moving forward, I will be the point of contact for you. I'll be able to help you get the most out of your Office Depot Business Account and guide you through any difficulties you may find along the way. I try to reach out monthly, however if there is anything that you need in the interim, please reach out to me any time.
Thanks again, and have a great day!
Scott Pearson Inside Account Manager SMB Acquisition | Office Depot, Inc. 9501 Amberglen Blvd. Suite 200 | Austin, TX 78729 Tel: (855) 337-6811 Ext: 12854 | scott.pearson@officedepot.com
Office Depot | Max
NEED A CATALOG? https://business.officedepot.com/a/content/catalog/virtualcatalog/?cm_sp=footer-_-shopping-_-online-catalogs
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.
